Comment: >Frank Davis saw a lot of waste during his decades in the federal government. In November, he voted for Donald Trump to get rid of it. So far, Davis likes a lot of what he has seen.  Probably worth noting that this administration hasn't cut many costs if any at all. The Trump administration has spend more than $200 billion more overt he past 3 months than the Biden administration did last year in this time frame (and something that is only projected to get worse).  So no, these people don't "like a lot of what \[they have\] seen," they just like to be lied to with not an ounce of critical thought about what they see while the admin does the opposite of what it "promised". And those quotes are doing \*very\* heavy lifting here.
